response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, as it represents years of innovation and dedication. We are confident that its worth to you surpasses $1,000,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,250,000. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a price that reflects its true value while also providing you with significant savings. We believe this offer presents an excellent balance between the product's worth and your budget. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your experience and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 1250000}
